nodes.text: What is the Story of Princess Leia?

What is the Story of Princess Leia? is a canon young-readers novel that follows Princess Leia Organa. It was written by Brandon T. Snider and Who HQ, and illustrated by Patrick Spaziante and was published by Penguin Workshop on March 25, 2021.
Who HQ brings you the stories behind the most beloved characters of our time.
The Force is strong in Leia Organa of Alderaan--a rebel princess who fights to save the people she loves.
